__e: I am just sick of you using me and Dawn and this entire facility-- I'm fine with it.

Now that we've found each other, I can provide everything Dawn does and a whole lot more.
Once again, Dawn, I can't understand a word you are saying.
Me being with Dawn has nothing to do with what you did.
